contents:
95948美元是平均工资，刚刚入职的新员工不可能有这么多。CBP官网的介绍：

https://www.cbp.gov/careers/cbpo-pay-and-benefits

CBP Officer is a career ladder position with a grade level progression of GS-5, GS-7, GS-9, GS-11, and GS-12. You will be eligible for a promotion to the next higher grade level (without re-applying) once you successfully complete one year in each grade level, with supervisor approval. For example if you started as a CBP Officer in December 2019 you could:


  • Start as a CBP Officer in December 2019 as a GS-5 and make $41,830 per year

  • Be promoted in December 2020 to GS-7 and make $57,519 per year

  • Be promoted in December 2021 to GS-9 and make $74,222 per year

  • Be promoted in December 2022 to GS-11 and make $94,314 per year

  • Be promoted in December 2023 to GS-12 and make $104,516 per year



也就是第一年只有4万左右（包括加班费），理论上如果可以做到每年一升的话五年之后可以到10万；不知道实际的升迁速度如何。

美国的政府雇员待遇其实跟中国政府公务员差不多，工作有保障（政府部门通常不会裁员），晋升基本上是论资排辈，工资不算高，不过福利待遇还可以，工作满一定年限后可以拿退休金，算是个铁饭碗。

和中国政府最大的区别是美国政府属于清水衙门，员工除了工资加班费夜班补贴之外没有任何油水可捞，敢于贪污受贿就等着开除公职坐班房吧。
